derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English wesle, wesule, of West Germanic origin; related to Dutch wezel and German Wiesel

entry.def: A weasel is a small wild animal with a long thin body, a tail, short legs, and reddish-brown fur.

means.word_mean: 1. small carnivorous mammal with short legs and elongated body and neck
